hint.prompt:
TASK: Generate guidance for text span highlighting/selection.

INPUT DETAILS:
- Text to annotate: "${text}"
- Annotation task: ${description}
- Available labels: ${labels}

INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Guide toward identifying specific text portions that need highlighting
2. Focus on boundary detection and span selection criteria
3. Help distinguish between different types of spans to highlight

HINT REQUIREMENTS:
- Identify markers that indicate span boundaries (start/end points)
- Point out different types of spans corresponding to available labels
- Guide toward precise text selection (not too broad/narrow)
- Highlight contextual clues for span classification

keyword.prompt:
TASK: Extract boundary markers and span indicators.

INPUT DETAILS:
- Text: "${text}"
- Annotation task: ${description}
- Available labels: ${labels}

OBJECTIVE: Identify words that mark span boundaries or indicate span types.

SELECTION CRITERIA:
- Boundary markers (punctuation, transitional words)
- Type indicators for different span categories
- Start/end signals for text segments
- Classification markers within spans
- Structural elements that define spans
